Magic
Spell Slots: D1: 7; D2: 5; D3: 4; D4: 4; D5: 4
Spells:
Animal Growth (D5 Alte): R80' Doubles (Reverse halves) the size, HD, and damage of 8 animals for 40 rd
Animal Summoning I (D4 Conj): R800' Calls 8 4 HD animals to assist self
Animal Summoning II (D5 Conj): R1200' Calls 6 8 HD or 12 4 HD animals to assist self
Barkskin (D2 Alte): Touched gains -1 Armor Class and +1 non-spell saves for 24 rd
Commune With Nature (D5 Divi): Self learns nature info about surrounding 10 mile radius
Cure Disease (D3 Necr): Touched recovers from disease (Reverse infects; Save neg)
Detect Snares & Pits (D1 Divi): Self discerns outdoor traps or indoor pits in a 10'x40' path for 80 rd
Entangle (D1 Alte): R80' Plants in a 20' radius immobilize passers (Save half movement) for 1 tn
Feign Death (D2 Necr): R10' Willing target appears dead, takes half damage, and gains immunity to draining for 44 rd
Fire Trap (D2 Evoc): Opening touched object inflicts 1d4+20 HP in a 5' radius (Save half)
Hallucinatory Forest (D4 Illu): R80' Creates an illusionary 800' sq forest
Hold Animal (D3 Ench): R80' Immobilizes 4 animals for 40 rd (Save neg)
Invisibility To Animals (D1 Alte): Touched cannot be detected by animals for 30 rd
Obscurement (D2 Alte): Creates a mist that limits vision in a 200' cu for 80 rd
Pass Plant (D5 Alte): Allows self to teleport up to 600 yd between trees of the same species
Pass Without Trace (D1 Ench): Touched leaves no tracks or scent for 20 tn
Plant Door (D4 Alte): Allows self to move effortlessly through vegetation for 20 tn
Predict Weather (D1 Divi): Forecasts weather in a 9 sq mile area for the next 40 hr
Protection From Fire (D3 Abju): Touched gains immunity to normal fire and +4 saves and half damage from magical fire (immunity to magical fire if cast on self) for 240 HP
Purify Water (D1 Alte): R40' Decontaminates (Reverse contaminates) 20' cu water
Repel Insects (D4 Abju): 10' radius expels normal insects and wards against giant ones (Save inflicts 1d6 HP) for 20 tn
Speak With Animals (D1 Alte): R40' Allows self to converse w/chosen type of animal for 40 rd
Warp Wood (D2 Alte): R200' Bends a 20"x300" wooden item
Water Breathing (D3 Alte): Allows touched to breathe water (Reverse breathe air) for 20 hr
Magic Notes:
Bonus Spells: Spell level D1x2, D2
Charming Music: R40' 80% chance to charm creatures with performance (Save 1 rd); may use Suggestion effects w/charmed creatures (Save -2 neg)
Defensive Song: Performance counteracts song attacks and soothes shriekers
Poetic Inspiration: 2 rd performance gives allies +1 attack and +10% morale for 1 tn
Shapeshift: May change into a natural animal, regaining 1d6x10% HP, 3/dy
